# cmccloudv2_kubernetesv2_nodegroup_gpu_config (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_kubernetesv2_nodegroup_gpu_config" "nodegroup_gpu_1" {
    cluster_id 		= "93cf35f9-f570-4a6c-aeb1-115a0de256c9"
	nodegroup_id 	= "db478032-0d65-4f12-8d43-bdfeeab879f8"
	gpu_model 		= "GPU-Accelerated-1080Ti"
	driver 			= "580.65.06"
	strategy 		= "single" 
	mig_profile 	= "all-1g.5gb" 
	gpu_profiles { 
		name 		= "nvidia.com/gpu"
		replicas 	= 2
	}
	gpu_profiles {
		name 		= "nvidia.com/mig-1g.5gb"
		replicas 	= 2
	} 	
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) The ID of the Kubernetes cluster to attach the GPU config to
- `driver` (String) The driver of the GPU config
- `gpu_model` (String) The GPU model of the GPU config
- `nodegroup_id` (String) The ID of the node group to attach the GPU config to

### Optional

- `gpu_profiles` (Block Set) The GPU profiles of the GPU config (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--gpu_profiles))
- `mig_profile` (String) The MIG profile of the GPU config
- `strategy` (String) The strategy of the GPU config, a valid value is single or mixed
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--gpu_profiles"></a>
### Nested Schema for `gpu_profiles`

Required:

- `name` (String) The name of the GPU profile
- `replicas` (Number) The replicas of the GPU profile


<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
- `update` (String)
